# General info

Goal : handles nested mutators 

Arg : probability to add a new level to the current nest
Output : nothing

# Variables

var 1 : DNA ptr
var 2 : DNA at var 1
var 3 : cmp var
var 7 : shift

# Pseudo-code

```{pseudo class.source='foldable'}
if RMM not initialized (-2):
- init params
else:
- mutate itself

Then:
Call nested mutators
```

# Code

## DNA code

### Raw code

```{DNA class.source='foldable'}
GSTART_ID, id_mut_FIB, id_tRNA_CVARS, LV_place, 3, id_mut_FIB,


id_tRNA_RET, GSTOP_ID, 0, 0, 0, 
```


### Commented code


```{pseudoDNA class.source='foldable'}
*get DNA ptr and shift from stack*
id_tRNA_SP_GSPLV, 1                 // var1 <- TOPS  (p)
id_tRNA_SP_GSPLV, 7                 // var7 <- TOPS  (p)
id_tRNA_INCLV, 1, 7                 // var7-- (p-1)
id_tRNA_SLVDLV, 1, 1                // var1 <- DNA ptr
id_tRNA_SLVDLV, 7, 7                // var7 <- DNA shift

id_tRNA_INCLV, 0, 1                 // var1++
id_tRNA_RGLVLV, 2, 1                // var2 <- body val at var1 (depth)
id_tRNA_CMPLVcst, 0, 2, -2, 3       // var3 <- var2==-2 ?
id_tRNA_IF0, 3
|
| *init mutator*
| // before : 40001, -2, ID
| id_tRNA_GScstLV, -1, 1            // replace -2 by -1
| id_tRNA_INCLV, 0, 1               // var1++
| id_tRNA_INCLV, 0, 1               // var1++ (skip ID of mutator) 
| id_tRNA_GADD, -2, 1               // write -2
| id_tRNA_INCLV, 0, 7               // var7++
| id_tRNA_INCLV, 1, 1               // var1--
| // after : 40001, -1, ID, -2
|
id_tRNA_SIJ
| *mutate*
id_tRNA_SEJ


id_tRNA_RGLVLV, 2, 1                // var2 <- body val at var1 (skip )
id_tRNA_OPELVLV, 0, 1, 2            // var1+=var2    (skip params)

*put DNA ptr and shift onto the stack*
id_tRNA_ScstLV, 99, 1               // put var1 at p
id_tRNA_INCcst, 1, 99
id_tRNA_ScstLV, 99, 7               // put var7 at p-1
```
